1688710.name: Stop the Blight
1688710.description:
A tower defense rogue-lite where the battlefield is yours to shape.

An ancient evil has awakened, and the Blight is spreading across the land. As a Guardian of the Arcanum, you wield the only weapon capable of pushing it back. In a desperate last stand, defend the realm by building towers, casting powerful spells, reshaping the terrain, and stop the Blight at its source.

Reshape the Battlefield

The terrain is yours to command. Raise, lower, or level voxel ground to create walls, carve out chokepoints, and claim the high ground. Shape the battlefield to control enemy movement and build your ideal defenses, but stay alert. The Blight spreads, enemies adapt, and your carefully constructed defenses won’t last forever.

Contain the Blight

The Blight spreads like a living corruption, creeping across the battlefield and damaging any towers it overtakes. Some enemies spread it as they move forcing you to constantly adapt. Clear infected ground and hold your territory, or risk being consumed by the Blight itself.

Harness Elemental Power

Discover elemental runes that enhance your towers and spells. Runes come in different rarities, applying effects like Burn, Slow, Poison, and Mark. Or boosting stats like damage, range, and health. Mix and match to unlock powerful synergies and shape your strategy each run.

Survive Ever-Changing Maps

Each mission is procedurally generated, offering new terrain layouts, enemy combinations, and challenges every time you play. One map might give you natural choke points and high ground. Another might force you to carve out your own. As the Blight spreads and enemies adapt, no two battles feel the same.

Grow Stronger Between Runs

Even in defeat, your progress carries forward. Collect Arcane Shards to unlock permanent upgrades that enhance your Core, strengthen towers, improve spellcasting, and tilt luck in your favor. Start each run a little stronger, whether that means more health, better runes, or a second chance when things go wrong. Choose how you grow, and slowly turn the tide against the Blight.

Core Features

  • Tactical tower defense with rogue-lite progression

  • Raise or destroy voxel terrain to control the battlefield

  • Fight swarms of enemies empowered by a spreading Blight

  • Discover elemental runes with status effects and stat boosts

  • Unlock permanent upgrades that carry over between runs

  • Defend 6 biomes, each with unique terrain and a deadly mini-boss

  • Choose from 6 elemental Cores, each with unique starting towers and spells

  • Build with 18 towers, cast 18 powerful spells, and experiment with 30+ runes
